title: Hour 3 - Chris Mannix (04-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Chris Mannix (04-01-20)
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Chris Broussard fill in for Dan Patrick and discuss what's next for New England following the departure of Tom Brady and debate whether or not Cam Newton would be a good replacement. The guys look forward to the early debut of the Michael Jordan documentary, "The Last Dance" and Chris Mannix from Sports Illustrated helps the guys imagine the return of the NBA season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Doug Gottlieb and Chris Broussard fill in for Dan Patrick and discuss what's next for New England following the departure of Tom Brady and debate whether or not Cam Newton would be a good replacement. The guys look forward to the early debut of the Michael Jordan documentary, "The Last Dance" and Chris Mannix from Sports Illustrated helps the guys imagine the return of the NBA season.
